name: Web Browser
text:
A web browser (or just browser) is an application used to access the world wide web.

Popular Browsers

The most popular internet browsers include:

  • Firefox
  • Chrome
  • Safari
  • Microsoft Edge

Update your Browser

Chrome

  • Click the Triple Dot button in the top right of your browser
  • Hover Help at the very bottom of the list
  • Click on About Google Chrome
  • Chrome will check for updates. If available, click to download
